description: Demolition of the existing conservatory and erection of single storey rear extension (6.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.8m and eaves height of 3.0m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii).

Unless clearly specified otherwise, the base of the development shown on the approved plans is taken to be external ground level, and not a Damp Proof Course or Internal Finished Floor Level. The external ground level is expected to remain consistent before and after construction of the approved development unless specified otherwise on the approved plans.
Please arrange to make a payment for Â£462 in relation to your application. This can either be made online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor appropriate works with no adverse impact upon tree health or amenity.Recommendation:No objections.
